<rule xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset" id="maven-javax-to-jakarta-00004">
             <when>
                <filecontent filename="pom.xml" pattern="groupId>javax.{renamed-g}<"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                    <hint category-id="potential" effort="1" title="javax.{renamed-g} groupId has been replaced by jakarta.{renamed-g}">
                          <message>If you migrate your application to JBoss EAP 7.3, or later, and want to ensure its Maven building, running or testing works as expected, use instead the Jakarta EE dependency - groupId `jakarta.{renamed-g}`.</message>
                          <link href="https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_jboss_enterprise_application_platform/7.3/html-single/migration_guide/index#maven-artifact-changes-for-jakarta-ee_default" title="Red Hat JBoss EAP 7.3 Migration Guide: Maven Artifact Changes for Jakarta EE"/>
                          <tag>JakartaEE</tag>
                        <quickfix name="maven-javax-to-jakarta-g" type="REPLACE">
                               <replacement>jakarta</replacement>
                               <search>javax</search>
                        </quickfix>
                    </hint>
            </perform>
            <where param="renamed-g">
                <matches pattern="(enterprise|inject|json|json.bind|persistence|security.enterprise|validation)"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
